level.heading: Jurisdiction; form of complaint; affidavit; contents; undertaking to abide judgment of the court; failure of officer to obtain possession; publication against defendant; default; retention of property by marshal; sufficiency of undertaking, quashing writ, and return of property; motion for return of property; procedure; objection to sufficiency of security; determination and measure of plaintiff's damages; judgment for defendant and determination of damages. [Repealed.]
